story.text:
Welcome to the world of Pokemon!
I'm Professor Oak.
This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokémon! For some people, Pokémon are pets. Other use them for fights.
Ah, so your name is <Player>. Nice to meet you <Player>.

Your journey as a Pokémon trainer is about to begin.
Now you need to choose your first Pokémon.
You can choose one of these Pokémon. Now, <Player>, which Pokémon do you want?

Excellent, <Pokemon> is yours now, take good care of it.
Allow me to introduce you to Brendan.

Hi, I'm Brendan. I'm a friend of Prof. Oak's.
I see you got your first Pokémon.
How about a trainer battle?
That's a great idea. <Player> your objective is to defeat Brendan's Pokémon's by reducing it's HP.

text.win: That was a great battle. You may have won this time, but I'll beat you in our next battle. I'm gonna go train and become stronger.
text.lose: That was a great battle. Don't worry, you just became a trainer. Train harder and grow stronger and we'll battle again.

story.text:
So, I guess you are excited to explore and find more pokemon.
Here is a Pokédex, it'll help in recording the Pokémon you find.
To catch new Pokémon, explore in the wild, battle and weaken them. Then use a Pokéball.
You can have upto 6 Pokémon with you, rest will be transfered your PC. You can swap it at any time.

<Player> you gotta enter the Pokémon League. If you can win it you'll be crowned as the champion.
Isn't that exciting.
You'll have to defeat the 8 Gym Leaders & the Elite Four to battle against the champion.
I'll be competing, we'll see which one of us can be the champion.
